titleStmt.title: By the Lord Deputy and Council. Tyrconnel. Whereas several persons in the province of Ulster, and the town of Sligo, in this his Majesties kingdom, have entred into several associations, containing no less offence than high treason...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Deputy (1687-1689 : Tyrconnel)
Tyrconnel, Richard Talbot, Earl of, 1630-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook and Samuel Helsham, assignes of Benjamin Tooke ... ;
for T.G. and are to be sold by Richard Baldwin, ...

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Signed at end: A. Fytton. C. Granard. Lymerick. Bellewe. Will. Talbot. Tho. Newcomen. Rich. Hamilton. Fran. Plowden.
